responses: What can I do for you?

patterns: how many courses are there in this college
responses:
Tulsiramji Gaikwad patil College OF Engineering & Technology An Autonomous institute Affilated to RTM Nagpur University, 
For Post Graduation (PG) we have been offering the specialization (Msc) in Following branch.
For Under Graduation(UG) we have been offering the followings:

1. Bachleor of Technology B.Tech(BE) 

2. BCA (Bachleor of Computer Application) 

3. MCA(masters of Computer Application)
TGPCET college offers 4 year B.tech ,  2 Years M.tech course  and 3 year BCA course.

patterns: how long will be  B.tech or M tech
how long will it take to complete BCA or MCA course
responses: TGPCET college offers 4 year B.tech   2 Years M.tech course  and 3 year BCA course and 2 years of MCA course.

patterns: what is the location of the college
how many semesters are there in a year
how many semesters one should study in a year
responses: There are two semesters in a year.

patterns: how many months are there in a semester
how long will be a single semester
responses: The single semester will be around 4 months.

patterns: what are the student requirements  of Documents for admission of Direct Second year
responses:
####Documents Require for Addmission ###
1.Indian Nationality Certificate
2.Domicile Certificate
MHT - CET / JEE / GATE / AIMCET Score Card / MBA - CET / MCA - CET / CAT
 3.12 th Mark sheet CAT
4.10 th Mark sheet
5.Transfer / Leaving Certificate
6.Provisional Passing / Diploma / Degree Certificate
7.All year / semester Diploma / Degree Mark sheet
8.Eligibility Certificate
 9.Migration certificate
10.Equivalence Certificate
11.Gap Certificate
12.Admission letter in original
13.Caste certificate
14.Caste Validity certificate
15.Non creamy layer certificate

patterns: what are the student requirements for admission of 1st year
admission requirements for BE first  year
responses:
Eligiblity CRITERIA 
HSC (Std.XII) or Equivalent with subjects English and PCM/PMB/ PM Biotech/PM (any Technical Vocational sub and non-zero score in JEE.
 Minimum aggregate 45% (135/300) marks in Physics, Mathematics and Chemistry / Biology / Biotech / Vocational Subjects for Open Category and Minimum aggregate 40% (120/300) marks in
 PCM Group for SC/ST/VJ/NT/DT/SBC/OBC Candidates from Maharashtra state only.

patterns: what are the student requirements for admission of Direct Second year
responses:
Eligiblity CRITERIA 
Diploma of MSBTE or Autonomous Institution or Diploma equivalent to the Diploma awarded by MSBTE/B. Science Degree (English Medium).
 Minimum aggregate 50% (Open) and 45% (Other Category) marks in Diploma Course in Engineering or Technology of MSBTE or B.Sc. Degree 50% (Open) and 45% (Other Category) marks for Maharashtra candidates

patterns: what are the student requirements for admission of M.tech
responses:
Eligiblity CRITERIA 
The Candidate should be an Indian National
Passed Bachelor Degree in the relevant field of Engineering and Technology from All India Council for Technical Education or Central or State Government approved institutions or equivalent, with at least 50% marks (at least 45% marks in case of candidates of Backward class categories and persons with disability belonging to Maharashtra State only
Obtained non zero positive score in Graduates Aptitude Test in Engineering (GATE) conducted by Indian Institute of Technology
For sponsored candidates, minimum of two years of fulltime work experience in a registered firm/ company/industry/ educational and/ or research institute/ any Government Department or Government Autonomous Organization in the relevant field in which admission is being sought..

patterns: how many classes will be there in a day
responses: There may be four Classes & three  praticals per day. Each class will be of 45 minutes.

patterns: what is the teaching style of this college?
Is the teaching pattern different from other college?
responses:
Our college has different teaching patterns than other colleges of Nagpur. We adopt a  teaching methodology, following the LTW techniques which stands for Lecture, Tutorial and Workshop.
You can provide us with your contact details and our counselors shall reach out to you and provide you with further details.
There are assignments which carry more weight than your written exams. The assignments have deadlines which you should not exceed if you want to get better marks.
You can message us here at any hours. But our college premises will be open from 11:00 am to 5:00 pm only.

patterns: will there be any extra curriculum activities ?
does the college conducts any fun program
responses:
Yes, Of course. Our college not only provides excellent education but also encourage students to take part in different curriculum activities. The college conducts yearly programs like Sports, Carnival, Holi festival, and Flash MOb . 
 Also our college has basketball court, badminton court, table tennis, chess, carrom board and many more refreshment zones.

patterns: How many Branch available in College ?
responses:
In B.Tech  the following Branch are :
 Computer science & Engineering (CSE)
 Information Technology (IT)
 Electrical Engineering (EE)
 Mechanical Engineering (ME)
 Auronotical Engineering(AE) 
 Biotechnology Engineering(BTE)

patterns: what facilities are provided by the college?
what are the facilities of college for students
responses: With excellent education facilities, Our College provides various other facilities like 24 hours internet, library, discusson room, canteen, Hostel Facilities , Bus facilitie, parking space, and student section  for any students queries.
